alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 16 at 10:10PM EDT until October 18 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the lower 30s possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northeast and northwest Ohio and northwest Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
